en.The theoretical return to the player for: The theoretical return to the player for this game is -1%.
The theoretical return to the player for Rainbow Spins feature buy is -2%.
en.Coins awards extra spin, increased multi: Coins award extra spins, increased multiplier and added rainbow lines in Rainbow Spins!
en.Each nudge increases the Wild multiplier: Each nudge increases the Wild multiplier by 1!
en.Coins award added lines, multipliers and: Coins award added win lines, multipliers and spins.
en.Gaelic Gold is a video slot with 2 featu: Gaelic Gold is a video slot with 2 features: xNudge Wild and Rainbow Spins.
en.5 win lines (see pay table for more info: 5 win lines (see pay table for more info).
en.A Wild symbol substitutes for any symbol: A Wild symbol substitutes for any symbol except Bonus.
en.A 3-row high Wild symbol exists on reel: A 3-row high Wild symbol exists on reel 1, 2 and 3 and will always nudge to fully visible.
en.Each nudge increases the Wild multiplier: Each nudge increases the Wild multiplier by 1.
en.Several Wild multipliers add to each oth: Several Wild multipliers add to each other for a total Wild multiplier on the line win.
en.A Wild multiplier will be multiplied wit: A Wild multiplier will be multiplied with the win multiplier in Rainbow Spins.
en.Landing the Pot of Gold Bonus symbol in: Landing the Pot of Gold Bonus symbol in the middle position on the middle reel, will activate the Rainbow Spins with a minimum of five spins.
en.Before Rainbow Spins starts, additional: Before Rainbow Spins starts, additional modifiers may be added – extra spins, added multiplier and rainbow lines.
en.Pick from the 9 coins to get additional: Pick from the 9 coins to get additional modifiers for the Rainbow Spins. A minimum of one coin will always be awarded before start.
en.Rainbow Lines: 2 out of 9 coins, awards: Rainbow Lines: 2 out of 9 coins, awards +2 additional rainbow lines per coin.
en.Extra spins: 3 out of the 9 coins, awar: Extra spins:  3 out of the 9 coins, awards up to +25 spins per coin.
en.Extra Win Multiplier: 3 out of the 9 co: Extra Win Multiplier:  3 out of the 9 coins, awards up to 5x multiplier per coin.
en.Start: 1 out of 9 coins. Starts the bonu: Start: 1 out of 9 coins. Starts the bonus and no more modifiers can be chosen.
en.Note: Features will be auto-selected dur: Note: Features will be auto-selected during bonus trigger.
